verses.samhita: nama# iriqNyA#ya ca prapaqthyA#ya caq nama#H ki(gm)SiqlAya# caq kShaya#NAya caq nama#H kapaqrdinE# ca pulaqstayE# caq namOq gOShThyA#ya caq gRuhyA#ya caq namaqstalpyA#ya caq gEhyA#ya caq nama#H kAqTyA#ya ca gahvarEqShThAya# caq namO$ hradaqyyA#ya ca nivEqShpyA#ya caq nama#H pA(gm)saqvyA#ya ca rajaqsyA#ya caq namaqH SuShkyA#ya ca hariqtyA#ya caq namOq lOpyA#ya cOlaqpyA#ya caq-[  ] 19

nama# UqrvyA#ya ca sUqrmyA#ya caq nama#H paqrNyA#ya ca parNaSaqdyA#ya caq namO#&paguqramA#NAya cABiGnaqtE caq nama# AkKidaqtE ca# prakKidaqtE caq namO# vaH kiriqkEByO# dEqvAnAq(gm)q hRuda#yEByOq namO# vikShINaqkEByOq namO# vicinvaqtkEByOq nama# Anir. haqtEByOq nama# AmIvaqtkEBya#H || 20
